title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 301 - Use Of State Property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 301 - Use Of State Property

State Regulations
§ 301.1 - Applicability, policy
§ 301.2 - Types of activities allowed
§ 301.3 - Types of activities not allowed
§ 301.4 - Fees
§ 301.5 - Procedure for application to use state property for other than public assemblies
§ 301.6 - Procedures for application to use state property for public assembly
§ 301.7 - Right to decline an application
§ 301.8 - Right to limit use due to unforeseen circumstances
§ 301.9 - Scheduling, cancellation, consistency with application

Subpart 301-1 - Repealed

Subpart 301-2 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 301

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §200

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
